snippet: The attacks, which killed one soldier and set off a gun battle that left 16 militants dead, were the latest along the volatile and porous Afghanistan-Pakistan border.
lead_paragraph: The attacks, which killed one soldier and set off a gun battle that left 16 militants dead, were the latest along the volatile and porous Afghanistan-Pakistan border.

headline.main: Taliban Attack Military Posts in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Taliban Attack Military Posts in Pakistan
